name: Togist
body:
###This is a simple plugin to create public gists on github.

##All you need to do is : 

~~~
1. Select some text/code on any webpage.

2. Right click on the selection.

3. Click on togist as you see in the screenshot 

4. Enjoy! 
~~~

[INSTALL IT](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ddommmoecmndjejocdikjendidfoecal/details)

[DEMO](https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=TzvuSnVmoH0)
tagline: Create gist out of any selected text, chrome plugin.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
